author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Stranded abroad as coronavirus closes borders
description: As global travel restrictions expand, hundreds of foreign nationals are struggling to return home.
content:
With the coronavirus spreading at a rapid pace, many governments have introduced strict controls on domestic and foreign travel.
But this has left many people trapped abroad. Some governments are working to repatriate those facing difficulty. For others thou… [+5123 chars]
